message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a method for the automated verification of temporal properties of infinite state systems using constraint logic programs (CLP). This work involves program analysis and program transformation techniques, which are commonly studied in the sub-categories of programming languages (cs.PL) and logic in computer science (cs.LO). The verification of software systems is also a topic of interest in software engineering (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper discusses the effectiveness of the proposed method through verification experiments, which could fall under the sub-categories of formal methods (cs.FL) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
